faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our services and how we operate.

questions.question: What are the stages of implementation?
bullets: Purchasing Odoo licenses (we coordinate this for you)
Paying the setup and training costs
Providing us with your business data
Starting the account setup, configuration, and data upload
Training and final delivery

questions.question: I want to know more about Odoo ERP hosting?
bullets: Free cloud hosting during the active license period on their servers, suitable for those using the system as-is without customizations

Advanced hosting called 'SH', which allows code access and customizations, provides a staging environment, and costs around 3,500 SAR per year. It suits 30–40 users and includes 50GB storage (scalable based on needs)
Private server hosting, where a cloud server is dedicated to you starting at around 2,000 SAR per month for the smallest option. Cost increases with specs
You can install the system on your own server (locally or on cloud providers like AWS). This requires a one-time installation fee starting from $1,000 based on workload

questions.question: What is the support policy for the Odoo ERP system?
bullets: Odoo provides free support throughout the subscription period via support tickets on their official website
We also offer one-month free support after project scope completion, including bug fixes and responses via email

questions.question: What terms and conditions should I be aware of?
bullets: We commit to executing tasks according to best industry practices
We commit to maintaining the confidentiality of your private data
Implementation follows Odoo's standard features unless otherwise stated in the scope
All work and training are conducted remotely (online)
The client must assign one contact person for approvals
Any required inputs must be provided within 5 days of request
Training must be completed within one week after setup
The project is considered complete after setup and training regardless of your system usage
Unjustified delays will incur a 5% penalty of the project cost per week of delay, payable in advance
Setup fees are non-refundable unless work hasn't started due to force majeure

questions.question: Do you offer annual support and maintenance contracts for Odoo ERP?
bullets: We offer 'Success Packages' valid for one year from the purchase date, usable for technical support and additional work like training, new module setup, development, data import, and system integrations. Pricing is as follows:
25-hour package = 8,750 SAR
50-hour package = 17,000 SAR
100-hour package = 33,000 SAR

questions.question: Are there any additional expected costs?
bullets: Yes, such as user license needs or extra work like:
Modifying or creating custom reports
Adjusting fields, screens, workflows, or permissions
Additional development for specific features or modules
Expanding usage (e.g., adding POS, warehouse, or apps)
Integrating with external platforms or systems
Additional online training (250 SAR per hour)

questions.question: Are there extra charges for Odoo ERP apps?
bullets: No, all Odoo apps are included with the user license
